description:
Insulted by Goku’s nonchalance regarding the Tournament of Power, a warrior from the 11th Universe challenges Goku to a battle for justice!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goku wird nicht vergeben! – Toppo, der Kämpfer für Gerechtigkeit!
Never Forgive Son Goku! Toppo the Warrior of Justice Intrudes!!
No te lo perdonaré, Son Goku. Toppo, el guerrero de la justicia, interviene
Son Goku Yurusumaji! Seigi no Senshi Toppo Rannyuu!!
孫悟空許すまじ! 正義の戦士トッポ乱入!!
